sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165030 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE165010 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.CONB_CD = AA.CONB_CDDL AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.ATTR_YR )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE165030 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,CONB_SEIL_NUM /* 기부금조정일련번호 */ ,CONB_CDDL /* 기부금유형구분코드 */ ,CTRB_TYCD /* 기부금유형신고코드 */ ,ATTR_YR /* 기부년도 */ ,USE_AMT /* 기부금액 */ ,PYR_DDC_AMT /* 전년도공제된금액 */ ,DDC_TRGT_AMT /* 기부금공제대상금액 */ ,THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS /* 해당연도공제금액필요경비 */ ,THC_YR_DDC_AMT /* 해당연도공제금액세액공제금액 */ ,THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_소멸금액 */ ,THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_이월금액 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD , AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AC02.SYSTEMKEY , ( ( ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AC02.DPOB_CD ASC, AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR ASC, AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD ASC, AC02.SYSTEMKEY ASC)) + (SELECT (NVL(MAX(AA.CONB_SEIL_NUM),0) + 1) AS CONB_SEIL_NUM FROM YE165030 AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) ) AS ROWCNT ,AC02.CONB_CD ,AC02.CONB_CHG_CD ,AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR01 ,AC02.DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT ,0 ,AC02.DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT ,0 ,0 ,0 ,0 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_CD , CONB_CHG_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR AS YRTX_BLGG_YR01 , SUM(NVL(DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# GROUP BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_CD , CONB_CHG_CD ) AC02 )

INSERT INTO YE165030 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,CONB_SEIL_NUM /* 기부금조정일련번호 */ ,CONB_CDDL /* 기부금유형구분코드 */ ,CTRB_TYCD /* 기부금유형신고코드 */ ,ATTR_YR /* 기부년도 */ ,USE_AMT /* 기부금액 */ ,PYR_DDC_AMT /* 전년도공제된금액 */ ,DDC_TRGT_AMT /* 기부금공제대상금액 */ ,THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS /* 해당연도공제금액필요경비 */ ,THC_YR_DDC_AMT /* 해당연도공제금액세액공제금액 */ ,THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_소멸금액 */ ,THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_이월금액 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) (SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM ,(CASE WHEN CONB_CDDL = '10' THEN 'B0230010' WHEN CONB_CDDL = '20' THEN 'B0230020' WHEN CONB_CDDL = '40' THEN 'B0230040' WHEN CONB_CDDL= '41' THEN 'B0230041' WHEN CONB_CDDL = '42' THEN 'B0230042' ELSE 'B0230050' END) , CONB_CDDL , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE167440 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )

INSERT INTO YE165030 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ , YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ , CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ , SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ , CONB_SEIL_NUM /* 기부금조정일련번호 */ , CONB_CDDL /* 기부금유형구분코드 */ , CTRB_TYCD , ATTR_YR /* 기부년도 */ , USE_AMT /* 기부금액 */ , PYR_DDC_AMT /* 전년도공제된금액 */ , DDC_TRGT_AMT /* 기부금공제대상금액 */ , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS /* 해당연도공제금액필요경비 */ , THC_YR_DDC_AMT /* 해당연도공제금액세액공제금액 */ , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_소멸금액 */ , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_이월금액 */ , KYBDR /* 입력자 */ , INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ , INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ , ISMT /* 수정자 */ , REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ , REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ , YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ , CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ , SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ , CONB_SEIL_NUM /* 기부금조정일련번호 */ , CONB_CDDL /* 기부금유형구분코드 */ , CTRB_TYCD , ATTR_YR /* 기부년도 */ , USE_AMT /* 기부금액 */ , PYR_DDC_AMT /* 전년도공제된금액 */ , DDC_TRGT_AMT /* 기부금공제대상금액 */ , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS /* 해당연도공제금액필요경비 */ , THC_YR_DDC_AMT /* 해당연도공제금액세액공제금액 */ , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_소멸금액 */ , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_이월금액 */ , KYBDR /* 입력자 */ , INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ , INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ , ISMT /* 수정자 */ , REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ , REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ FROM YE165030_TEMP WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM YE165030 KK01 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND KK01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND KK01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND KK01.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND KK01.DPOB_CD = YE165030_TEMP.DPOB_CD AND KK01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = YE165030_TEMP.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND KK01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = YE165030_TEMP.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND KK01.SYSTEMKEY = YE165030_TEMP.SYSTEMKEY AND KK01.CTRB_TYCD = YE165030_TEMP.CTRB_TYCD ) )

INSERT INTO YE165030 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL ,CTRB_TYCD , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #conbSeilNum# , #conbCddl# , #ctrbTycd# , #attrYr# , #useAmt# , #pyrDdcAmt# , #ddcTrgtAmt# , #thcYrDdcAmtNdXps# , #thcYrDdcAmt# , #thcYrNducExtnAmt# , #thcYrNducCrfwAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE165030 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum# , CONB_CDDL=#conbCddl# , ATTR_YR=#attrYr# , USE_AMT=#useAmt# , PYR_DDC_AMT=#pyrDdcAmt# , DDC_TRGT_AMT=#ddcTrgtAmt# , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS=#thcYrDdcAmtNdXps# , THC_YR_DDC_AMT=#thcYrDdcAmt# , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT=#thcYrNducExtnAmt# , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT=#thcYrNducCrfwAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165030 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CONB_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE165030 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
